skills.skill: Development Stack (PHP, .NET, CSS3, HTML/HTML5, XHTML, SQL, API’s, nodejs, JavaScript)
User Story / Agile Kanban / ITSM (ServiceNow, Jira, & Smartsheets / MS Projecfts)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and train employees in the use of ERP functionality (Finance, Sales, Inventory, Manufacturing, Purchasing, Service)
Develop and maintain relationships with partners to optimize and enhance ERP and integrations
Collaborate with implementation team, internal user groups, and IT staff to facilitate the successful upgrade of the Dynamics GP ERP
Participate in Integration Test and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and testing functionality
Own and maintain Dynamics GP and related applications for the Malibu brand including data, integrations, and reporting
Maintain and support Malibu Dynamics GP / CRM including various 3rd party ISV’s, database, and servers

Develop and extend the ERP environment to support company growth including product testing, upgrades, expansion of 3rd party ISV’s, integrations, custom coding, reports, data maintenance, and processes
Ensure SOX and regulatory compliance through management of processes, maintaining proper documentation, and evidence
Assist IT staff in routine duties
Utilize database management, ERP maintenance, and reporting technologies in use

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
